title: @Riot - victorious skins via hextech crafting?
body: I know you will not sell the victorious skins and I do appreciate that. It would be unfair to those who've earned them with their skills. However, there are many ppl who would do a lot to get them (eg, me). What if we could get victorious skins via hextech crafting under certain circumstances? Let's say I gotta be Mastery level 7 (when you realease lvls 6 & 7) with Elise and at least platinum player to have a chance to have Victorious Elise as a reward. I suppose that's a contentious issue. Just wanted to bring the idea to the table. Could it be discussed?

Hey Dafthar - 

This is always a hot issue, as there are certainly two sides to this discussion. It's something we discuss, especially when new things like Hextech Crafting come about. I can definitely see where both sides are coming from. 

Players who own the skins don't want others to be able to obtain them because it's something that they earned as a reward for a specific ranked season. 

Players who don't own them can't obtain them, and they don't feel great about that, especially if they joined the game in season 3, and never had a chance to grab Victorious Jarvan or Victorious Janna (I'm still salty I didn't play ranked back then. :P)

That said, we don't have plans to include limited skins in Hextech Crafting, which means that Victorious skins **will not** be included. 

If you have more questions about the system, you can check out the [boards post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/cuuOtBkZ-hextech-crafting-and-loot-qa)!

As someone who has the last two victorious skins, I can safely say that I wouldn't mind if other people who didn't have the chance had some way of acquiring it. Perhaps I'm in the minority here, but it's just a skin and I don't think it's a very big deal.

have you considered something like this:

you must have champion mastery rank of 7(or higher if the cap goes up) with the champ that the skin belongs to

and

you mush end the season with gold or higher.

if those conditions are met, you will receive a special skin fragment for that champion (along with your normal ranked rewards) that can be crafted into the victorious skin of that champion.

This way only players that are really dedicated to that particular champ will get it while still maintaining the requirements that the skin had in the past, so that players who already have the skin won't feel too cheated for others getting it.

Maining this particular champion would be the key, this is where champion mastery comes in.

The thing is, I was a lil bit late, RIP. But when I know a lot more about the champion, play this champion more often etc., it still feels kinda unfair. I will respect any decision made by Riot. Joking aside, I just wonder if you think there'll ever come a time where a solution that pleases both parties may arise.

See this is what I'm talking about. Both parties have valid points, but isn't there a way to make both parties happy? We should search for that. Having either side of the issue being completely closed off to the possibility of a compromise not only stifles honest discussion about what could be done, but callously disregards the honest player pain felt by the other side.

I mean, even Nintendo releases rare Pokemon like Mew only once in a blue moon (for NA), and they've only had like 2 or 3 Mew distributions in total so far... but they've given that chance to old AND new players. Even if there isn't another distribution for the next 5 years, at the very least people have had a FEW chances to get it over the course of Pokemon's life.

I can't say how this would apply to Victorious Skins specifically, because those are in a little different situation than other limited skins... but for skins such as PAX I see a fairly similar situation.

Point being... Let's find alternatives, not just say it's impossible.

It's hard to say if/what we'd do in this scenario. 

I agree that there would need to something implemented to make players who earned the skin/had the skin prior feel special about their skins, sort of like what we did when we swapped some skins (like Candy Cane Miss Fortune) from limited to legacy. Not sure what that solution would be for these cases, as that limited to legacy swap was several years ago. 

It's certainly an ongoing discussion on our end, but we haven't come to a consensus as to if this is something we'd like to do or not, and if we wanted to do it, how we'd go about it.

I know this is an old post but I was curious about this topic since I main Janna and Morgana and feel bad that I never got the chance to obtain their Victorious skins. Plus I feel like the reward system is kind of slow... I rarely get chests and rarely get skin shards... and if i do it's normally some tacky cheap unpopular skin that's not worth anything in the store. I got a chest the other day from the once every 7 days and all i got was a Vayne skin shard... you don't know how much that tilted me... Especially when I get champion capsules from leveling up. And getting skins takes forever if you don't get orange essence or skins to disenchant to purchase them. I managed to get Elementalist Lux on my lowbie account i made for lunar revel and from the first of the two lunar orbs i got the skin shard from it. Too bad it costs like 3600 orange essence and i rarely get skins frequently. 

My main account is over level 100 and all i ever really get is champion shards and occasional blue essence. I've had 1 purple gemstone for a long time and that's about it. I end up having tons of mastery tokens but don't have the champion shards i actually need to upgrade them without spending all my blue essence on the mastery token. 3900 blue essence is a lot for a mastery symbol. xD

I feel like the loot/reward system should be similar to maybe Heroes of the Storm... where you have chances of purchasing certain skins if you save up enough in game reward currency over time... and in HotS and even Smite they have Mastery Skins that vary. That would basically be equivalent to your Chroma skins mostly. They have Gold skins, Diamond Skins and in HotS they have themed skins for masteries.

And you get daily/weekly rewards more often through missions and such... the only daily you get from League of Legends is a measly FWOTD which grants a petty 50 blue essence or whatever. Like come on now... I have to wait 24 hours to get 50 blue essence... that's insulting. Especially when Invest maybe 6-8 hours or more playing your game almost daily.

I also noticed that the rewards you get while leveling up a new account pre level 30 are basically throwing free shit at you. Which i'm not arguing against that since it's nice to get you started on a new account. But it's annoying that I get more things on my lowbie account in a shorter time frame compared to my Main account that's over level 100...

But perhaps to solve the Victorious skin solution why not add special portrait inner borders like some of the star guardian or project skins.
At least this way the people who got the victorious skins from the achievement can still have something to show that. Where as the people who got it from loot chests would simply have just the skin and not the fancy portrait.

And the fact that you have to buy rune pages still bugs me lol. Especially with how much they cost.

Anyways those are just my ideas and i'm sure people will agree or disagree.
